message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can negotiate further if you're not happy.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer.  Let's work together to reach a deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 40%. Let's meet in the middle at 70/30. If you reject this, we're just going to keep going down in value.
